name: Lovely Hentai
description: <strong>Lovely Hentai</strong> - is a puzzle game in which you have to assemble a single image from individual pieces.<br/>You need to collect from the small pictures one big and after you may to going at the new level.<br/><br/><strong>Features:</strong><br/><ul><li> A range of sizes from 9 to 36 pieces<br/></li><li> Button to automatically complete the level<br/></li><li> Auto Saving<br/></li><li> Simple mouse control<br/></li><li> Traditional puzzle gameplay<br/></li><li> Gallery<br/></li><li> Steam Achievements</li></ul><strong>Credits:</strong> This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
